title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Stay connected with Park News.               What can students learn about the Carter's?               Browse photos, watch videos, & listen to audio.               Explore activities for the young & young at...         Â    News Stay connect with the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site and get information on current events. Photos & Multimedia Browse photos, listen to audio, and watch videos that will enhance your plans to visit the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site.  History & Culture The story of the small rural town that raised the 39th President of the United States begins here. Nature The relationship between Jimmy Carter and the town of Plains, Georgia is connected to the geographical features of the region in which they both were developed. Education Connect with rangers through a distance learning program, use our education website to download teaching aids and materials, plan field trips, or browse for professional development opportunities. Kids & Youth Explore fun activities that will enhance the visit for the children. Learn about summer camps held to educate children on the National Park Service system. Meet Your Park Learn about the day to day operations of the park, the staff that manages the park, and get details on park projects and budgets. Bookstore Eastern National is a non-profit organization that provides quality educational products and services to the visitors of America's National Parks and other public trusts.
